name: STUFF BATTLE
description:
Compete awkwardly with your PHONE as your GAMEPAD against TENS of friends in this frantic minigame PACKED game.

FRIENDS NOT INCLUDED!!!!!!

The game happens on your computer screen. A LINK will be displayed to help you JOIN THE GAME ROOM with your phone and transform it into a gamepad. It's really super multiplayer, but not online per se. It's online, but you have to be in front of the one computer screen play with other people.
